import React, { Component} from 'react' import { Container } from 'react-bootstrap'; class DriveForm extends Component{ state = { subscription: false, location:'', distinatin:'', date:'', hour:'', stops:'', carId: '', carType:'', seatsNum:'', remarks:'' } handleChange = (e) => { this.setState({ [e.target.id]: e.target.value }) console.log(this.state); } handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); console.log(this.state); } render() { return (
) } } export default DriveForm
